document.full_text: former u.s. open champion andy roddick has pulled out of this week's nice open with a shoulder injury and may not be fully fit for the french open starting on sunday.
document.title: roddick a doubt for french open after nice withdrawal
lines_and_colors: former u.s. open champion andy roddick has pulled out of this week's nice open with a shoulder injury and may not be fully fit for the french open starting on sunday.
